title: Expected rise in MS affects nominal variables only

content.prompt: In the long run, a fully anticipated expansion of the money supply will

choices.label: increase both the price level and real gross domestic product
increase the price level and decrease the real wage
increase both the price level and the real wage
increase both the nominal gross domestic product and the price level
increase both the nominal and real gross domestic product

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
